DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate clinical effectiveness mouthwash contain pomegranate peel extract chlorhexidine mouthwash bleed brush count streptococcus mutans among group Egyptian child permanent dentition .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Mouthwash Containing Pomegranate Peel Extract Chlorhexidine Mouthwash Bleeding Brushing
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate clinical effectiveness mouthwash contain pomegranate peel extract chlorhexidine mouthwash bleed brush count streptococcus mutans among group Egyptian child permanent dentition . PICO : Population ( P ) : Children full permanent dentition . Intervention ( I ) : Pomegranates peel extract . Comparator ( C ) : Chlorhexidine . Outcome ( O ) : Primary outcome : Bleeding brushing , criterion : Asking patient , unit : Binary . Secondary outcome : Counting streptococcus mutans , criterion : Agar plate , unit : CFUs/mL
DOC.criteria: child age 1215 year old . Cooperative child . Both gender . Medically free . Children undergoing orthodontic treatment . Children use oral hygiene aid routine teeth brushing . Children known history allergy mouth rinse drug . Parents unable give inform consent .
